title: TheLastWhale
author: TheLastWhale
created_time: November 27, 2023, 10:50:32 AMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 11:00:36 AM by TheLastWhale
content: The Last Whale Web3 gameThe Last Whale is a Web3 game that absolutely anyone can win. The game is governed by the rules in the Binance Smart Chain smart contract. Rules: https://discord.com/channels/1175546512693002402/1175889908276142090How To:We invite you to participate in testing the new web3 game!Testing is carried out on the BSC test network.What should be done?1. Write the command !want_to test2. Download Metamask wallet3. Follow the instructions to set up the BSC test network4. Add free BNB to your wallet balance using the faucet https://testnet.bnbchain.org/faucet-smart5. Go to the contract address https://testnet.bscscan.com/address/0xcc183345b4ccf3e8de40d016da9c2c0f9af5bd136. Go to the "Contract" tab7. Go to the "Write contract" subtab8. Click on the "Connect to web3" button to connect your wallet9. Click on the "deposit" function and indicate how much BNB you want to send to the Treasury10. Click "Write" and confirm the transaction in your wallet11. Write to chat !finished_testingSmart contract address - https://testnet.bscscan.com/address/0xcc183345b4ccf3e8de40d016da9c2c0f9af5bd13Twitter - https://twitter.com/lastwhalegameTelegram Official Group - https://t.me/thelastwhalegameDiscord - https://discord.gg/jdHkFvZ6GitHub - https://github.com/thelastwhalegame/theLastWhaleGameTheLastWhaleToken (TLWT):Total supply - 120 000 000 TLWTBlockchain - Binance Smart ChainUtility - rewarding winners, staking, deflationary model

comments.author: TheLastWhale
comments.body: We have started the testing phase. 13 people are participating in the first round, which will end on Tue Nov 28, 2023 00:00:00 UTC. Join us! All participants will be rewarded with game tokens on the main network!

comments.body: ✅We are moving into the phase of transferring functionality to the mainnet. ✅In a few days the game will be available to all users of the BSC network. Thanks to everyone who took part in testing!https://t.me/thelastwhalegamehttps://discord.gg/jdHkFvZ6
